mapper.update: update sys_school set school_name = #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select school_id, school_name, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_school where school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select school_id, school_name, `status`, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from sys_school
